name: Judson Wilson's CVXPY Examples Portal
body:
This page is a temporary portal to Judson Wilson's CVXPY examples until they are integrated into the CVPY Documentation.

The links to my IPython Notebooks below are using the [nbviewer tool](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/) to render the notebooks in my [github fork](https://github.com/JudsonWilson/cvxpy/tree/judsons_examples) of the CVXPY repository.

* Antenna Array Design: Minimize beamwidth of an array with arbitrary 2-D geometry   
[Original CVXPY Example](http://web.cvxr.com/cvx/examples/antenna_array_design/html/ant_array_min_beamwidth.html#source) - [New CVXPY Example](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/JudsonWilson/cvxpy/blob/judsons_examples/examples/notebooks/cvx_ports/antenna_array_design/ant_array_min_beamwidth.ipynb)

* Circuit Design: Sizing of clock meshes   
[Original CVXPY Example](http://web.cvxr.com/cvx/examples/circuit_design/html/clock_mesh.html#source) - [New CVXPY Example](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/JudsonWilson/cvxpy/blob/judsons_examples/examples/notebooks/cvx_ports/circuit_design/clock_mesh.ipynb#Sizing-of-clock-meshes)

* Filter Design: Chebychev design of an FIR filter given a desired H(w)   
[Original CVXPY Example](http://web.cvxr.com/cvx/examples/filter_design/html/fir_chebychev_design.html) - [New CVXPY Example](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/JudsonWilson/cvxpy/blob/judsons_examples/examples/notebooks/cvx_ports/filter_design/fir_chebychev_design.ipynb)

* Entropy Maximization   
[Original CVXPY Example](http://web.cvxr.com/cvx/examples/log_exp/html/max_entropy.html) - [New CVXPY Example](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/JudsonWilson/cvxpy/blob/judsons_examples/examples/notebooks/cvx_ports/log_exp/max_entropy.ipynb)

* Sparse covariance estimation for Gaussian variables    
[Original CVXPY Example](http://web.cvxr.com/cvx/examples/log_exp/html/sparse_covariance_est.html) - [New CVXPY Example](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/JudsonWilson/cvxpy/blob/judsons_examples/examples/notebooks/cvx_ports/log_exp/sparse_covariance_est.ipynb)

* Computing a sparse solution of a set of linear inequalities    
[Original CVXPY Example](http://web.cvxr.com/cvx/examples/sparse_heuristics/html/sparse_solution.html) - [New CVXPY Example](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/JudsonWilson/cvxpy/blob/judsons_examples/examples/notebooks/cvx_ports/sparse_heuristics/sparse_solution.ipynb)

* l_1 trend filtering    
[Original CVXPY Example](http://web.cvxr.com/cvx/examples/time_series_analysis/html/l1_trend_filter_snp500.html) - [New CVXPY Example](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/JudsonWilson/cvxpy/blob/judsons_examples/examples/notebooks/cvx_ports/time_series_analysis/l1_trend_filter_snp500.ipynb)

* Nonnegative matrix factorization   
[Original CVXPY Example](http://web.cvxr.com/cvx/examples/html/nonneg_matrix_fact.html) - [New CVXPY Example](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/JudsonWilson/cvxpy/blob/judsons_examples/examples/notebooks/cvx_ports/nonneg_matrix_fact.ipynb)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
